Name: Zoella Rose Martinez ("Zoey")
Address: North 73rd Street and Greenwood Avenue North
Description:
Zoey's body was found in an alley on Wednesday 1st September. On 6th September Jacaree Hardy was arrested on suspicion of her murder.

> On September 1st Zoella "Zoey" Rose Martinez, 20 was found murdered in Seattle. Today the hunt for her killer ended in his arrest.
> 
> Our community has lost a friend and loved one.
> 
> While no news reports revealed that she was a trans woman, we have been given permission by her family to reveal this. They proudly stood by their daughter through her transition and will continue to do so.
> 
> Zoey was the 38th known trans or non binary individual lost to violence this year.
> 
> The original police report filed on September 1, while respectful didn't identify the victim as transgender - "At approximately 5 am, a jogger flagged down officers and said there was a person down in the alley near North 73rd Street and Greenwood Avenue North."
> 
> Detectives with the SPD Homicide Unit, CRG Unit, and US Marshalls arrested Jacaree Hardy on September 6th, 2021 in the city of Renton without incident. Detectives are currently questioning him and will book him into King County Jail when they are done.

https://www.pinknews.co.uk/2021/10/20/zoella-rose-martinez-death-trans-seattle/

https://www.q13fox.com/news/zoey-martinez-murder-judge-sets-5m-bail-for-suspect-accused-of-shooting-woman-5-times
  
https://www.planetrans.org/2021/10/arrest-made-for-murder-of-transgender.html

Zoella Rose Martinez ("Zoey") was murdered in Seattle, Washington (USA) on 1 Sep 2021.

She was 20. #SayHerName #TransLivesMatter #TDoR

Name: Jay Hoarau
Description:
Jay's body was found in his room.

> A young trans man found dead in Saint-Denis.
> 
> According to reports, a 16-year-old Trans Reunionese man was found dead in his room in Saint-Denis in Reunion.
> 
> Starting in sixth grade in high school, after years of school harassment (verbal, physical and online.) By school's “so-called comrades with impunity”, Jay took his own life in his bedroom on Friday the 3rd September 2021 in Saint-Denis (Meeting).
> 
> His name was Jay HOARAU, born March 17, 2005 in Tampon, died at 16 by suicide, found dead September 3, 2021 in Saint-Denis (Réunion).

https://www.sos-transphobie.org/un-jeune-trans-retrouve-mort-a-saint-denis
Tweet:
Jay Hoarau died by suicide in Saint-Denis, Réunion (France) on 3 Sep 2021.

He was 16. #SayHisName #TransLivesMatter #TDoR

Name: Hevelyn Montine
Description:
Hevelyn's body was found with gunshot wounds in undergrowth alongside the GO-174 highway.

> Goiânia – A [trans woman] was found dead in Rio Verde, southwest of Goiás, this Saturday (4/9). The body of 30-year-old Hevelyn Montine had three gunshot wounds and was lying in undergrowth on the side of the GO-174 highway clad only in her underwear.
> 
> According to G1 Goiás, the victim was dressed in a lingerie top and high-heeled sandals. Hevelyn was not carrying documents and was identified by fingerprint by the Institute of Identification of the Civild Police and Goiás. The Scientific Police carried out an investigation at the place where the body was found. The Civil Police of Goiás is investigating the case and trying to find the person responsible for the murder.
> 
> Friends of Hevelyn, who was born in Santa Helena de Goiás, paid tribute on social networks and asked for justice and punishment for those responsible for the crime.
> 
> One of her friends wrote “God's Justice does not fail. Rest in peace”.

Hevelyn's Facebook profile is https://www.facebook.com/hevelyn.montine.5.

Name: Devanny Cardiel
Address: calle Molino de Guanajuato y calle Molino de Independencia
Description:
Devanny was shot inside her home salon at around 8pm on Sunday 5th September. She was a trans ambassador for the state of Guanajuato.

> Leon, Gto. The death of a transsexual woman in her aesthetics puzzled the residents of calle Molino de Guanajuato in the Paseos del Molino neighborhood.
> 
> This crime was registered at 7:45 p.m. in the business located in a house on the aforementioned street and the corner of calle Molino de Independencia. Neighbors claimed to have heard at least a couple of shots from a small-caliber weapon at the home where the victim lived and had her business.
> 
> Municipal police found the bloody body of the woman in the main room of the house.
> 
> Later, paramedics from the rescue corps arrived and confirmed the death of the victim, who was approximately 30 to 40 years old .
> 
> Most of the residents who approached the cordonings guarded by the Municipal Police and the National Guard and identified the deceased person as Devanny Cardiel, a trans ambassador for the state of Guanajuato.
> 
> Her neighbors were concerned about her death as there could be a hint of hatred towards her and there had been shooting crimes registered in the colony in recent days. At the time of going to press no detainees had been reported who were involved in the murder of the trans woman.


<iframe src="https://www.facebook.com/plugins/post.php?href=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.facebook.com%2FLasJoyasDeSanpancho%2Fposts%2F800301750644282&show_text=true&width=500" width="500" height="724" style="border:none;overflow:hidden" scrolling="no" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; web-share"></iframe>

> Today Sunday September 5th was taken the life of a great human being, a great trans ambassador friend of the state of Guanajuato Devanny Cardiel, we will remember you and carry in our hearts, thank you for giving us the chance to match in this life.
>
> Fly high fly free
>
> We will miss you
>
> From #JoyasGto
>
> We join the pain.

<iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/xQIJ0P-PKi0" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

Devanny was originally from Silao, and had had to leave her home at 16 due to the rejection and violence she faced from her family for being trans. She was cremated the day before what would have been her 40th birthday.

Her Facebook profile is https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100017032901237.

Name: Kadir Murat Sözübir
Description:
Kadir was stabbed by a client after he discovered she was trans. Her killer has been arrested. > In Fatih, a person named Abdürrahim E. stabbed Murat Sözübir to death when he went to her house. The person who claimed that he went to Sözübir for the purpose of sex was arrested on the charge of 'deliberate killing' and sent to prison. > > Trans [woman] Kadir Murat Sözübir (42) was stabbed 6 times in her own home on September 5 in Fatih. Sözübir, who was an amateur vocalist who shared videos of her singing on her Youtube channel, died in the hospital where she had been taken. The suspect Abdürrahim E. (25) surrendered to the police in Tekirdag along with the knife he used in the crime. > > The suspect claimed that he went to Murat's house for the purpose of sexual intercourse, and when he realized that Sözübir was trans, he killed her in a struggle that took place while trying to get back the 100 TL he gave her. Abdürrahim E., who also made a self-defense defense, was arrested on the charge of "deliberate killing" and sent to prison.
View this post on Instagram

A post shared by Kadir Murat Sozubir (@kadirmuratszbr)

> "The other half of my face was broken in a brass-embroidered mirror. Everyone was sleeping. Azan sounds were heard in the hijaz maqam in Istanbul. Half of my face is mine, I always tell half stories with half of my face. I'm not even invisible!" Kadir's Facebook, Instagram and Twitter profiles are https://www.facebook.com/kadirmuratsozubir, https://www.instagram.com/kadirmuratszbr/ and https://twitter.com/kdrmrtszbr. Name: Disaya Monaee Smith
Description:
Disaya was found in a hotel room by police responding to reports of a shooting. She was pronounced dead in hospital an hour later. > CHICAGO, IL The National Black Justice Coalition (NBJC) mourns the death of Disaya Monaee Smith, a Black transgender woman from Chicago, Illinois. Disaya Monaee Smith’s death was initially reported by Beverly Ross on Instagram. Ross reported that Disaya Monaee Smith died on September 6th [at the Prestige Inn and Suites at 1335 E. Sibley Blvd.] in Dolton, IL. > > “We mourn the loss of Disaya Monaee Smith,” explained NBJC Deputy Executive Director Victoria Kirby York. “2021 is on track to be the deadliest year on record for transgender and non-binary people – and in Chicago, Disaya Monaee Smith’s killing marks the fourth transgender person to be murdered in the Chicago region this year alone. Illinois, Dolton, and county police departments must do more to proactively prevent the continued loss of trans lives happening across their city.”

Another Black Trans Woman died, I’m tired of burying my youth. Disaya Monaee rest in power. Killed in Dolton, Illinois pic.twitter.com/4i94zcUZUq

— BraveSpaceAlliance (@BraveSpaceChi) September 6, 2021
Disaya's Facebook profile is https://www.facebook.com/maurice.moneybegshawtyy. *[Editor's Note: News reports give Disaya's age as 32, however she maintained an escort profile which lists her as 23.]* https://www.advocate.com/crime/2021/9/14/black-trans-woman-disaya-monaee-fatally-shot-chicago-suburb https://www.planetrans.org/2021/09/transgender-woman-of-color-disaya.html https://www.windycitytimes.com/lgbt/Trans-woman-Disaya-Dior-Monaee-Smith-a-victim-of-violence-dies/71387.html https://nbjc.org/nbjc-mourns-the-death-of-disaya-monaee-smith/ https://www.facebook.com/story.php?story_fbid=1519751488363724&id=353793928292825 https://www.facebook.com/bev.b.ross/posts/10162546370681959 https://www.facebook.com/bmoresafehaven/posts/868652077190880 https://twitter.com/BraveSpaceChi/status/1434911678236446721 https://web.archive.org/web/20210908083832/https://www.suncommercial.com/news/state/article_b8b86e7e-e499-5449-affd-a018a6286120.html https://www.nwitimes.com/news/local/crime-and-courts/man-dies-after-shooting-at-region-hotel/article_41f08b9c-a7a4-5a60-907f-4012b6ad8850.html https://www.pdclarion.com/news/state/man-dies-after-shooting-at-region-hotel/article_ad25d969-2d2b-5aef-b2bb-1beb581b8c54.html

Name: Raquel
Description:
Raquel was shot in the back of the head.

> A [trans woman], initially identified as Raquel, was shot dead this Saturday (11), near a forró house – known as 'Forró do Painho', in the Unamar neighborhood, in the second district of Tamoios in Cabo Frio, Lakes Region.
> 
> Preliminary information reveals that Raquel would have been killed with gunshots to the back of the head.
>
> The military and civil police attended the scene to investigate and the victim's body was removed to the IML in Cabo Frio.

Name: Kelly Alves ("Dandara")
Description:
Kelly was shot in her home, allegedly by someone she was in a relationship with.

> A trans woman was shot dead in the Entra Apulso community, in the Bobocão allotment, in the municipality of Paudalho, in Zona da Mata Norte of Pernambuco. The victim's body was found inside a house, on Monday (13), and the crime was confirmed by the Civil Police this Tuesday (14).
> 
> The victim was identified as Kelly Alves. Witnesses reported that they heard gunshots in the house where she was on Sunday night (12). The next day, her body was found and the Military Police was called.
> 
> Kelly's age and profession were not disclosed. The Civil Police reported that the trans woman was hit by more than one shot from a firearm.
> 
> The suspect in the crime was identified only as Bruno, whose relationship with the victim was not disclosed by the police. At the time of the most recent update to this report, no one has been arrested.

Name: Ella Nik Bayan
Description:
Ella died by suicide in front of a department store on Alexanderplatz. She was an Iranian refugee who had been living in Germany for several years.

A vigil for Ella was held in Alexanderplatz five days after her death.

> BERLIN taz | Although around 200 people are standing in front of a department store on lively Alexanderplatz, there is complete silence. It is the mourning rally for Ella, as they all call her, a transsexual woman from Iran who burned herself in public on this spot last Tuesday. Little by little people emerge from the crowd and put flowers and candles down. Many people cry, some softly, some loudly. A photo, a small cross and the blue-pink-white Pride flag of transgender people were also placed here.
> 
> The 40-year-old died in hospital on Wednesday. An employee of the department store had extinguished the burning woman with a fire extinguisher and a helicopter had taken her to the hospital. According to the police, it is not known why she took her own life. For everyone present, however, it is clear that it was the daily discrimination that drove her to suicide.
> 
> “I don't want to give a political speech,” says the organizer at the beginning. Like almost everyone here, she also found out about the suicide on Twitter. "But it's also clear that Ella left a political mandate," she continues. It is good to mourn together and to meet each other with appreciation.


<iframe src="https://www.facebook.com/plugins/post.php?href=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.facebook.com%2Fmaurusknowles%2Fposts%2F10226223536550968&show_text=true&width=500" width="500" height="714" style="border:none;overflow:hidden" scrolling="no" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; web-share"></iframe>

> "Ella, you did it to be seen."
>
> On september 14th, a trans woman of color set herself on fire on alexanderplatz and died a short time later as a result.
>
> Pictures from the mourning vigil on September 19th.


<iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/QiRxrl5NfAo" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

> Why Ella set herself on fire with suicidal intent, even people who knew her have no definite answer. "I think Germany did not meet the expectations that she had. Berlin pretends to be a free city - you are sexually and psychologically harassed on every corner." Ella also experienced that.
> 
> The two women knew each other through Dagmar's work. For 20 years she has been a volunteer medical contact person for trans people, including refugees. Ella was introduced to her by her therapist, like many others before. 
> 
> Like so many refugees, Ella assumed that she was welcome in Germany. She hoped for another life. In a video portrait of Ella from the Offenen Kanal Magdeburg from 2019, she says: “I had a good apartment in my home town, also work, a good salary. But I couldn't live in Iran as a trans woman. "
> 
> In Iran, homosexuality is punishable by death. As a trans woman, Ella could theoretically have lived there, but she would always have been denied social recognition. The great desire to simply be a woman was also denied her by various German training institutions. "The first place that gave her a diploma with the correct name and gender, Ella and wife, was TÜV in Berlin," says Dagmar. And she adds that Ella dreamed of working at Tesla.

Name: Ivanna Macedo Silva
Description:
Ivanna was robbed and murdered in her apartment. Two suspects have been arrested. > The murder of a 28-year-old woman, found on September 17, 2021 in her apartment in Paris, France, has caused great consternation. > > Ivanna Angeline Macedo Silva belonged to the LGTBI community and worked in the beauty industry in France. His body was found in his apartment in the city of Courbevoie, west of Paris. > > His mother, Libertad Silva Agurto, lives in the village of Cachipampa (Peru) and asks the French authorities to clarify the facts: > > “ My daughter was robbed, then her life was taken, and so far two Peruvians have been arrested as suspects in this crime. I will go to France to repatriate her body to Peru so that she can benefit from a Christian burial, ”she told the Casmian Best Cable channel.

Bonjour

Acceptess-T et les communautés trans, sommes encore une fois en deuil.

Deux femmes trans sont mortes cette semaine. 1/6

— ACCEPTESS-T (@acceptesst) September 18, 2021
> Acceptess-T and the trans communities are in mourning once again. Two trans women died this week. > > Sasha a 22 year old trans woman took her own life. She had the support of her family and was very well surrounded, but the heavy weight of everyday and institutional transphobia drove her to suicide. > > Ivana, a 31-year-old Peruvian trans female sex worker, was murdered in her apartment. Her body was found last night. It was her friends who raised the alert to the authorities. > > With the agreement of the two families, our association will ensure that the rights of Sasha and Ivana are respected, and that Justice does its duty. We will not let any errors go by on the part of the administrations or on the part of the media. > > Any form of reproduction of transphobia will be denounced. Our deep condolences go first to their families and friends. We send a particular message to trans communities, you are not alone. > > In this process of fighting transphobia, you can count on us, we are here to support you. Do not be discouraged, together we will make it happen! In difficult times, call on us! A march was held for Sasha and Ivanna on 10th October 2021. https://diariocorreo.pe/edicion/chimbote/joven-casmena-fue-asesinada-en-francia-noticia/ https://www.xymedia.fr/pourquoi-la-communaute-trans-appelle-a-manifester-le-10-octobre/ https://tetu.com/2021/10/10/paris-reportage-manifestation-personnes-trans-contre-transphobie/ https://www.facebook.com/acceptesst/videos/422374895984396/ https://www.facebook.com/TransUnitedEurope/posts/2963265723959555 https://twitter.com/SOSTransphobie/status/1462861081676767239 https://twitter.com/acceptesst/status/1439214283078971393

Ivanna Macedo Silva was robbed and murdered in her apartment in Courbevoie, Hauts-de-Seine (France) on 14 Sep 2021.

She was 31. #SayHerName #TransLivesMatter #TDoR

Name: Alessandra Drummond
Description:
Alessandra was shot by a client. She was the second trans woman killed in Rio Verde in less than two weeks, following [Hevelyn Montine](https://tdor.translivesmatter.info/reports/2021/09/04/hevelyn-montine_rio-verde-goias-brazil_d2087251) on 4th September.

> A [trans woman] aged 29 was killed with a shot to the face after an alleged fight with a customer in the early hours of Friday (16) in Rio Verde in southwest Goiás. A video shows the victim approaching a vehicle and being shot by an assailant in the car. Other people at the scene then rushed to try to help her.
> 
> According to the Civil Police, the [trans woman] worked as a [sex worker] and the suspicion is that she was killed after a disagreement with the shooter, who was her client. The case is being investigated, but as of 3:00 pm, the police still have no leads on the perpetrator.
> 
> After being shot in the face, the victim was rescued and taken to the city's Emergency Care Unit. She arrived alive, but died in the facility.

A suspect was arrested for Alessandra's murder on Friday 1st October.

> A 37-year-old businessman in the towing of vehicles was arrested this Friday (1), suspected of killing a [trans woman] with a shot in the face last month, in Rio Verde in the southwest of Goiás. The crime was recorded by a security camera.
>
> The suspect was pre-emptively detained at home and is awaiting a custody hearing with the judiciary. His name was not released by the Civil Police. 

Alessandra's Facebook profile is https://www.facebook.com/paivagiovane.

Name: Brianna Ulmer/Brianna Hamilton
Description:
Brianna was shot in the head in the early hours on Friday 17th September and died in hospital. Her death follows that of [Disaya Monaee Smith](https://tdor.translivesmatter.info/reports/2021/09/06/disaya-monaee_dolton-illinois-usa_3dbb00a0) on 6th September.

> A 25-year-old Black trans Chicago woman is the latest victim of the ongoing campaign of terror targeting the trans, nonbinary, and gender nonconforming community.
> 
> Her name was Brianna Ulmer, also known as Briana Hamilton and Brinasty. She was shot to death in the early morning hours in the 7800 block of South Bishop, Auburn/Gresham neighborhood, South Side on September 17, 2021. From WGN9 (I fixed the misgendering)
> 
> Officers responded to a person shot in the 7800 block of S. Bishop around 6:30 a.m. Friday. Upon arrival, a person was found with a gunshot wound to the head. They were transported to Holy Cross Hospital where they were pronounced dead. No one is in custody. Area 2 Detectives are investigating.
> 
> Brianna lived in Chicago. Her social media feed is filled with affirmative self-love content as well as observations on culture, fashion, and society. It was just like the feed of most 25 year olds. She shared a recent trip to Detroit and posted sadly about the death of a local young man in her community. Her vibrancy is palpable. And that makes her death from a gunshot wound to the head in the early morning on the Chicago sidewalk so … numbing.
> 
> As of this post, the police had no leads and issued no more information. Notification of the community was delayed – as usual – by misgendering and deadnaming Brianna. Her friends and family stepped right up on that in the midst of their grief to set the record straight, a task most families don’t have to worry about during these times.

Brianna's Facebook profiles are https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100007761947565 and https://www.facebook.com/brian.howard.5682944.

Name: Sasha
Description:
Sasha died by suicide. Although she reportedly had the support of her family, the weight of everyday and institutional transphobia was just too much for her to bear.

Bonjour

Acceptess-T et les communautés trans, sommes encore une fois en deuil.

Deux femmes trans sont mortes cette semaine. 1/6

— ACCEPTESS-T (@acceptesst) September 18, 2021
> Acceptess-T and the trans communities are in mourning once again. Two trans women died this week. > > Sasha a 22 year old trans woman took her own life. She had the support of her family and was very well surrounded, but the heavy weight of everyday and institutional transphobia drove her to suicide. > > Ivana, a 31-year-old Peruvian trans female sex worker, was murdered in her apartment. Her body was found last night. It was her friends who raised the alert to the authorities. > > With the agreement of the two families, our association will ensure that the rights of Sasha and Ivana are respected, and that Justice does its duty. We will not let any errors go by on the part of the administrations or on the part of the media. > > Any form of reproduction of transphobia will be denounced. Our deep condolences go first to their families and friends. We send a particular message to trans communities, you are not alone. > > In this process of fighting transphobia, you can count on us, we are here to support you. Do not be discouraged, together we will make it happen! In difficult times, call on us! From https://www.instagram.com/p/CT9FNkgA2s_/: > I didn't know Sasha. It is not she who will write this text which nevertheless concerns her. > > Sasha is no longer here to talk to us. > > Our paths crossed by her mother, Isabelle, who sent me a message to share her distress and a need for leads following the death of her daughter, three days earlier. I can hardly imagine the feelings that a loving mother can have when - - writing these lines. On the other hand, I understand too much the course and the wounds which pushed Sasha to this passage to the act. Today we honor his memory on the account. His mother asked me, my conscience and my heart command me. There is a lot to see in Sasha's life. There is so much to watch in his death. And we will remember his name. > > Sasha was 22 years old. Having moved to Paris from Rennes, she studied fashion and design, which were part of her passions. Soul artist, creator, photography, drawing and music also animated her. > > In our discussions, her mother describes her as "a very strong personality, very exclusive and complete, sometimes a little 'diva' side. Very close to her big sister and faithful to her friends since kindergarten for some. She started her transition 3 years ago and has blossomed by asserting her personality ”. This, Isabelle had already underlined in her first message "we love Sasha, her whole personality, the beautiful person she has become". This family love has nourished each message that I received from this strong mother "her transition brought us much closer and the whole family supported and accepted her". I guess the strength of their bond, the strength that Sasha learned from this cocoon. This support is invaluable; it is not acquired by any trans person. Unfortunately, it is not enough to protect. > > Sasha committed suicide because at age 22, too much (e "transphobia made her life too painful. Too heavy. Sasha herself spoke of" insurmountable daily "suffering. > > She was young. She was in good health. Passionate, creative, strong, luminous, she was all his things. Trans and proud of her identity Sasha was living her liberation. And Sasha should have taken full advantage of it. > > Sasha, like each of us in this community, has not escaped transphobia. This violence which is not always satisfied with being lurking in the shadows. Transphobia is the wolf that watches from the forest. The angry crowd screaming at the monster and the lightning falling from the sky. No one is weak from being affected by transphobia. Sasha was not weak. > > Sasha suffered relentless and unfair violence. The smear of prejudice and mockery when who she was should have inspired respect and compassion. > > You don't need to have known Sasha to honor her memory and empathize. > > I want to scream shame at those who thought they could humiliate her. > > I want to tell them their responsibility. > > Too many of us understand. Too many names make up this list punctuated with tears A march was held for Sasha and Ivanna on 10th October 2021. The Instagram profile at https://www.instagram.com/sassha1406 is dedicated to Sasha. https://www.xymedia.fr/pourquoi-la-communaute-trans-appelle-a-manifester-le-10-octobre/ https://www.instagram.com/p/CT9FNkgA2s_/ https://mobile.twitter.com/acceptesst/status/1439702124653391874 https://twitter.com/acceptesst/status/1439214283078971393 https://twitter.com/le_chat_noir161/status/1439133033613901828 https://twitter.com/WittigMaddy/status/1439205869263077381 https://twitter.com/syndigayliste/status/1439497790397288454 https://twitter.com/michaelistudio/status/1440056701198028809 https://www.facebook.com/acceptesst/posts/2767184893571899

Sasha died by suicide in Paris (France) on or shortly before 18 Sep 2021.

She was 22. #SayHerName #TransLivesMatter #TDoR

Name: Name Unknown
Description:
The victim was shot and killed by an unidentified assailant outside their own residence.

They were about 5'2, had a tattoo on the right leg and were wearing a striped singlet and orange shorts.

> The murder and shooting of a [trans person] by an unidentified assailant in Pasay City, Saturday at noon, is still a mystery to the police.
>
> In the report, other than the tattoo on the right leg, there was nothing else identifiable to the victim who was approximately 25-39 years old, 5’2 tall and leaning with stripes and orange shorts.
>
> According to the Pasay City Police Station, the victim was standing at OC Laurel Street, corner of Decena St., Barangay 96, Pasay City, at 12:30 pm when the culprit suddenly appeared and shot them in the head.
>
> The body of the victim was lying down when PCpl Bryan Jonas Agasino and PCpl John Ray Bravo of Libertar Substation reached the area.
>
> The identity of the victim and the perpetrator and motive of the crime are currently being ascertained.

TvT partner organisation: APTN

Name: Gina Rodríguez Sinuiri
Address: cuadra 31 de la Av. Tomás Valle
Description:
Gina was stabbed in a hotel room. A suspect is being sought by police.

> Gina Rodríguez Sinuari, a young 25-year-old from Pucallpina, was killed by two stab wounds in a room she rented in a hotel in Callao.
> 
> According to her companions, the main suspect is a Venezuelan citizen with whom she had an intermittent relationship, who goes by the names of Ángel Rodríguez or Ángel Gutiérrez.
> 
> The attack occurred at 8 am on Monday, September 20, at the Aeropuerto hostel, located in the 31 block of Avenida Tomas Valle, in the Juan Ingunza urbanization. Gina Rodríguez received the subject in her room at 6 in the morning.  Two hours later, the lodging receptionist went to the guest room after her companion ran out and found her lying on the floor with two deep cuts to her abdomen. 
> 
> The victim was rushed to the San José hospital, but unfortunately died at dawn on September 21.
> 
> According to witnesses, the alleged murderer has had appointments with several of the sex workers of the place whom he contacted through Facebook and after each encounter he changed his name on the social network. Detectives from the Callao Criminal Investigation Division have requested the videos of the security camera of a casino that works next to the hotel that would have captured the arrival and the escape of the murderer for their full identification.
> 
> Various organizations of trans people spoke out about this crime demanding justice for the young woman and her relatives, and greater and better attention from the authorities.

Gina's Facebook profile is https://www.facebook.com/gina.sinuiri.

Name: Erika Tatiana Martínez García
Description:
Tatiana was stabbed in her home by unknown assailants. > Erika Tatiana Martínez García, a 32-year-old trans woman, was murdered on Sunday, September 26, at her home in Santa Rosa de Copán, western Honduras. After calling several times on the phone, her mother went to the apartment and found her daughter dead. Tatiana is the fourth trans woman killed in Honduras so far in 2021. > > Tatiana was the owner of a small business where she sold drinks and food and was also a member of the National Party to which the current Honduran president Juan Orlando Hernández belongs. > > Tatiana's transfemicide occurs ten days after President Hernández delivered an independence speech where he spoke out against sexual diversity and women, what the country's LGBTIQ + organizations considered "hate speech." > > Her mother wants justice for Tatiana, but she knows that most crimes go unpunished. “If justice is not done here, I know the Lord will. Nobody escapes from God, ”said Maria.

Hoy alzamos nuestra voz, con rabia y dolor por el asesinato de Tatiana, quien era una mujer trans, que residía en la ciudad de Santa Rosa de Copán, Tatiana fue asesinada a puñaladas dentro de su casa de habitación el día sábado 25 de septiembre. #Justiciaparatatiana pic.twitter.com/1tNFaRef8p

— unable (@unablevt) September 27, 2021
> Today we raise our voices, with anger and pain for the murder of Tatiana, who was a trans woman who lived in the city of Santa Rosa de Copán. Tatiana was stabbed to death inside her home on Saturday, September 25.#Justiciaparatatiana On Wednesday 29th September the Office of the United Nations High Commissioner for Human Rights (Oacnudh) condemned the murder and asked the authorities to carry out a "prompt, impartial and exhaustive" investigation of the crime. In December 2021 Francisco Cerrano Pacheco, 19, was arrested for her murder. https://www.latribuna.hn/2021/12/12/cae-joven-acusado-de-matar-a-chica-trans/ https://agenciapresentes.org/2021/09/28/a-pocos-dias-del-discurso-de-odio-del-presidente-de-honduras-asesinaron-a-una-militante-trans-de-su-partido/ https://tiempo.hn/investigacion-muerte-de-mujer-trans-copan/ https://www.laprensa.hn/honduras/onu-pide-honduras-investigacion-imparcial-asesinato-mujer-trans-transgenero-GE2341668 https://www.swissinfo.ch/spa/honduras-violencia_la-onu-pide-a-honduras-investigaci%C3%B3n-imparcial-del-asesinato-de-mujer-trans/46989620 https://www.planetrans.org/2021/09/transgender-woman-murdered-in-honduras.html https://hch.tv/2021/09/27/matan-a-punaladas-a-tatiana-un-reconocido-travesti-en-santa-rosa-de-copan/ https://tiempo.hn/matan-a-mujer-travesti-en-copan/ https://www.facebook.com/ctvinter/posts/406850114275744
Tweet:
The body of Erika Tatiana Martínez García was found in her home in Santa Rosa de Copán, Copán (Honduras) on 26 Sep 2021.

She was 32. #SayHerName #TransLivesMatter #TDoR

Name: Name Unknown
Description:
The decapitated body of what is thought to be a trans woman was found in black bags dumped in the La Amistad neighborhood of Cancún on 27th September 2021.

> CANCÚN.- The body of a person was found this afternoon wrapped in a bag in a green area of the La Amistad neighborhood.
>
> The body was located by the locals who reported the discovery to the emergency number 911. The  location is about 40 meters from the highway known as Gas Auto and about 4 kilometers from Avenida José López Portillo.
>
> Initial police reports indicated that the body had no head and was found in black bags. One account indicates that the person could be a [trans woman], since they were wearing a bra.

TvT partner organisation: IBTE & https://noticaribepeninsular.com.mx/presunto-travesti-hallan-cuerpo-decapitado-en-colonia-la-amistad-en-cancun/
Tweet: A decapitated body which is thought to be that of a #trans woman was found in black bags dumped in the La Amistad neighborhood of Cancún, Quintana Roo (Mexico) on 27 Sep 2021. #SayHerName #TransLivesMatter #TDoR

Name: Name Unknown
Description:
The dismembered and headless body of a trans woman was found in black bags dumped in undergrowth. Her name is not known.

> CANCÚN.- The body of a person was found this afternoon in wrapped in a bag in undergrowth in the La Amistad neighborhood.
> 
> The body was located by the locals who reported the discovery to the emergency number 911, whose location is about 40 meters from the highway known as Gas Auto and about 4 kilometers from Avenida José López Portillo.
> 
> Initial police reports indicated that the body had no head and was found in black bags. One indicates that the person could be a [trans woman], as they were wearing a bra.

https://noticaribepeninsular.com.mx/presunto-travesti-hallan-cuerpo-decapitado-en-colonia-la-amistad-en-cancun/
Tweet: The dismembered and headless body of an unidentified #trans woman was found in black bags dumped in undergrowth in Cancun, Quintana Roo (Mexico) on 27 Sep 2021. #SayHerName #TransLivesMatter #TDoR

Name: > BOSSIER CITY
Age: La. (KSLA) - The Bossier City Police Department is investigating a homicide after a body was found inside an apartment.

Name: > BCPD says on Sept. 28
Age: officers responded to the Santa Fe Apartments in the 4800 block of E Texas Street for a welfare check when they found the female resident dead inside. An autopsy will be performed. The victim has been identified as Geri Judd.

Name: As Geri's murder only came to light several months later her name was not included on the TDoR 2021 memorial list released by Transgender Europe (TGEU) in November 2021.
,Geri Judd was shot in her apartment in Bossier City
Age: Louisiana (USA). Her body was found by police during a welfare check on 28 Sep 2021. #SayHerName #TransLivesMatter #TDoR"

Name: R. Tamboong
Description:
R. was stabbed in the neck. The killer alleged that the victim had made advances to them during a drinking session.

> According to the police investigation, the victim allegedly touched the perpetrator’s private parts multiple times. The suspect became enraged and suddenly stabbed Tamboong in the neck and other parts of her body with a “sanduko” (knife).

TvT partner organisation: APTN

https://brigadanews.ph/miyembro-it-lgbtq-community-sa-nabas-patay-matapos-gin-eabo-it-kainuman/

https://philnews.ph/2021/09/30/lgbt-member-dies-after-being-stabbed-by-man-he-allegedly-touch/
Tweet:
R. Tamboong was stabbed in the neck in Aklan, Visayas (Philippines) on 28 Sep 2021.

She was 48. #SayHerName #TransLivesMatter #TDoR

Name: B.
Description:
B. was kidnapped, tortured and executed. We only know her deadname.

> Sinaloa.- A young transgender [woman] from Mazatlán , Sinaloa, was tortured and murdered in Zacatecas, and now her family is asking the authorities for justice.
> 
> What is known is that the victim's name was [deadname], she was transgender, originally from Mazatlán, and was dedicated to selling bags to help a Rehabilitation Center in Fresnillo, Zacatecas.
> 
> According to data published on the Internet, the young [woman], who [presented as a woman], was selling garbage bags, to obtain resources for a rehabilitation center, when she was "picked up" by strangers.
> 
> She was later found executed and with her body showing signs of torture.

https://www.debate.com.mx/policiacas/Justicia-para-Brandon-Denuncian-asesinato-en-Zacatecas-de-un-joven-transgenero-de-Mazatlan--20211001-0316.html

https://imagenzac.com.mx/seguridad/hallan-cadaver-fresnillo-se-presume-es-el-homosexual-brandon/
Tweet:
A young #trans woman was kidnapped, tortured and executed in Fresnillo, Zacatecas (Mexico) on 30 Sep 2021.

At the time of writing we only know her deadname. #SayHerName #TransLivesMatter #TDoR

Name: Kiér Laprí Kartier
Description:
Kiér was found in her car suffering from a gunshot wound. She died in hospital. > ARLINGTON, Texas (CBSDFW.COM) – A transgender woman had no connection to the Arlington apartment complex where she was found with a fatal gunshot Thursday night, according to police, family and friends. > > Another driver pulling into the Madrid Apartments off Furrs Street on the city’s north side, found Kièr Solomon in the driver’s seat of her own car, with a door open and the engine running. She died in the emergency room at a local hospital. > > Police said they spoke to someone who heard a gunshot sometime around 9:30 p.m. Thursday, but were still looking for witnesses or video, and did not have solid leads yet in the case. A ballon release [was held for Kiér on 4th October](https://staceymonroe.pixieset.com/guestlogin/balloonreleasevigilforkierlaprikartier/).

A photo collection of the Balloon Release in honor of Kier Lapri. Photos courtesy of Stacey Monroe. Click the link for the full album. #translivesmatter @notonemore https://t.co/jL4ayudRX5 pic.twitter.com/MGhxmMzSCI

— Nu Transgender Movement, Inc est. 2016 (FB/Insta) (@nutransmovement) October 5, 2021
Kiér's Facebook and Instagram profiles are https://www.facebook.com/kier.solomon.3 and https://www.instagram.com/laprikartier. https://www.pinknews.co.uk/2021/10/09/kier-lapri-kartier-black-trans-woman/ https://www.advocate.com/crime/2021/10/04/kier-solomon-texan-black-trans-woman-shot-death-car https://www.them.us/story/kier-lapri-kartier-black-trans-woman-5th-trans-person-killed-texas-2021 https://www.star-telegram.com/news/local/crime/article254679642.html https://dallasvoice.com/arlington-police-investigating-murder-of-trans-woman/ https://newsnationusa.com/news/usanews/dallas/arlington-police-investigate-murder-of-transgender-woman/ https://www.msn.com/en-us/news/crime/arlington-police-investigate-murder-of-transgender-woman/ar-AAP2F7b https://timesnewsexpress.com/news/newsusa/dallas/arlington-police-investigate-murder-of-man-dressed-as-woman/ https://www.bluebookmedia.net/arlington-police-investigate-murder-of-transgender-woman-cbs-dallas-fort-worth/ https://twitter.com/nutransmovement/status/1445241062591803394 https://twitter.com/nutransmovement/status/1444003140035137540 https://www.facebook.com/nutransmovement/posts/4166028220193479

Kiér Laprí Kartier was found in her car in Arlington, Texas (USA) on 30 Sep 2021 suffering from a gunshot wound. She died in hospital.
